document_data.name: ''Gambit Armor''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gambit armor''''' was a type of [[enchanted]] [[armor]] designed for those unafraid to risk their lives in battle.
document_data.Description: [[Cloth armor|Cloth]] or [[leather armor]] could be enchanted as ''gambit armor''.
document_data.Powers: While this armor provided enhanced protection, its true power lay in granting the wearer advantages in battle when their life was in particular danger. This gave them a greater change of scoring a deadly blow immediately after receiving one, and once per day, the wearer could become more dangerous at the expense of exposing themselves to greater risk of injury.
document_data.Notable Owners: As of the {{YearlinkName|1479}},{{4e-time}} an [[Warlock Knights#Ranks|Executor]] of the [[Warlock Knights]] of [[Vaasa]] had enhanced their leather armor into ''gambit armor''. This Executor was part of the team responsible for investigating the rejuvenated [[Castle Perilous]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tyranny's Perilous Bastion|11-12}}
